advice_additional: Add any additional information about yourself, such as hobbies, volunteer work, driver's license, or any other details that you feel are relevant to your application
advice_summary: Recruiter tip: write 400-600 characters to increase interview chances

description_education: A diverse educational background on your resume showcases the unique value and expertise you bring to potential employers.
description_employment: Highlight your most relevant experience from the past 10 years. Focus on accomplishments
description_links: You can add links to websites you want hiring managers to see! Perhaps It will be  a link to your portfolio, LinkedIn profile, or personal website
description_skills: Describe your skills and make sure they match the key skills mentioned in the job listing
description_summary: Craft several energetic sentences highlighting your strengths. Specify your role, what you accomplished, and major achievements. Explain your motivation and list your key skills.
